word: "Then the devil taketh Him up into the holy city, and setteth Him on a pinnacle of the temple, and saith unto Him, If Thou be the Son of God, cast Thyself down; for it is written, He shall give His angels charge concerning Thee; and in their hands they shall bear Thee up, lest at any time Thou dash Thy foot against a stone." Verses 5, 6. But again Jesus met him with Scripture, saying, "It is written again, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God." Verse 7.
